Command.Name: echoCommand
Command.Description: Echos back whatever is input to the command.

Command.Name: exit
Command.Description: Exit the application completely.

Command.Name: version
Command.Description: Displays the current version of the application.

Command.Name: about
Command.Description: Displays the about message for the current application.

Command.Name: name
Command.Description: Displays a message with the name of the current application.

Command.Name: deployApplication
Command.Description: Deploy the application as part of the build-deploy-release cycle.

Command.Name: deployMetaData
Command.Description: Copies application meta-data from the package.json to the metaData.json file.

Command.Name: releaseApplication
Command.Description: Release the application as part of the build-deploy-release cycle.

Command.Name: help
Command.Description: Displays all of the commands names and descriptions.

Command.Name: workflowHelp
Command.Description: Displays all the workflows, names and values.

Command.Name: commandSequencer
Command.Description: Takes a sequence of commands/aliases and enqueues all to the command queue.

Command.Name: workflow
Command.Description: Loads the specified workflow, calls the command sequencer to get each commands enqueued.

Command.Name: printDataHive
Command.Description: Prints the specified data hive (CommandWorkflows, CommandsAliases, Colors, Configuration, or root) in the D-data structure.

Command.Name: clearDataStorage
Command.Description: Clears a sub-data hive or the entire Data Storage hive in the D-data structure.

Command.Name: businessRule
Command.Description: Executes a user specified business rule and prints the results.

Command.Name: commandGenerator
Command.Description: Generates and enqueues any number of command calls based on user input.

Command.Name: businessRulesMetrics
Command.Description: Computes statistics on business rule performance metrics and displays the results.

Command.Name: commandMetrics
Command.Description: Computes statistics on command performance metrics and displays the results.

Command.Name: convertColors
Command.Description: Converts all the colors in the color library from hex values to RGB values.

Command.Name: validateConstants
Command.Description: Validates all constants with a 2-phase verification process.

Command.Name: validateCommandAliases
Command.Description: Validates all command aliases for duplicates.
